name: registerAudioResource(_:options:)
desc: Registers an external audio to use as a custom waveform.

items.name: let CHHapticAudioResourceKeyUseVolumeEnvelope: String
items.desc: A key that identifies whether audio file playback fades in and out using an envelope.

items.name: typealias CHHapticAudioResourceKey
items.desc: A type alias for a key that identifies the playback behavior of an audio resource.

declaration:
func registerAudioResource(_ resourceURL: URL, 
                   options: [AnyHashable : Any] = [:]) throws -> CHHapticAudioResourceID
